name: TriggerBroadcastMessage
description:
Trigger a broadcast to a specific audience using Customerio.

This tool triggers a broadcast campaign in Customerio, allowing for message personalization via provided data. It should be called when you need to send messages to an audience already in your workspace, specified by a segment, email list, customer ID list, user map, or data file. It's important to handle existing users only, as the tool won't add or identify new users. Set flags to skip over non-existent users if needed. Designed for large audience message dispatch rather than individual interactions.

parameters.name: broadcast_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the broadcast campaign you want to trigger in Customerio. This ID is required to specify which broadcast to activate.

value_schema.description: The ID of the broadcast that you want to trigger.

parameters.name: broadcast_data
parameters.description: JSON object containing audience information and data for personalizing the broadcast messages.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Customer.io App API

parameters.name: broadcast_id
parameters.description: The ID of the broadcast that you want to trigger.

value_schema.description: The ID of the broadcast that you want to trigger.
